assigned_user_name.name: assigned_user_name
assigned_user_name.subquery:
SELECT opportunities.id
                    FROM ibm_businesspartners 		
                    INNER JOIN opportunities ON opportunities.assigned_bp_id = ibm_businesspartners.id 			
                                AND opportunities.deleted = 0
                    WHERE ibm_businesspartners.deleted = 0 
                    AND ibm_businesspartners.name LIKE '{0}'
                    UNION
                    SELECT opportunities.id 		
                    FROM users
                    INNER JOIN opportunities ON opportunities.assigned_user_id = users.id 			
                                AND opportunities.deleted = 0
                    WHERE users.deleted = 0
                    AND CONCAT(CONCAT(COALESCE(users.first_name,''),' '),COALESCE(users.last_name,'')) LIKE '{0}'

date_closed.name: date_closed
date_closed.comment: Expected or actual date the oppportunity will close

next_step.name: next_step
next_step.comment: The next step in the sales process

commit_stage.name: commit_stage
commit_stage.comment: Forecast commit ranges: Include, Likely, Omit etc.

mkto_sync.name: mkto_sync
mkto_sync.comment: Should the Lead be synced to Marketo

team_member_identifier.name: team_member_identifier
team_member_identifier.comment: special field to represent the role of identifier for an additional team member
team_member_identifier.subquery:
SELECT opportunities.id 		
                    FROM opportunities_ibm_businesspartners 		
                    INNER JOIN opportunities ON opportunities.id = opportunities_ibm_businesspartners.opportunity_id 			
                                AND opportunities.deleted = 0
                    INNER JOIN ibm_businesspartners ON ibm_businesspartners.id = opportunities_ibm_businesspartners.ibmbp_id 			
                                AND ibm_businesspartners.deleted = 0
                    WHERE opportunities_ibm_businesspartners.deleted = 0 	
                    AND opportunities_ibm_businesspartners.ibmbp_role = 'SFAIDN'
                    AND ibm_businesspartners.name LIKE '{0}'
                    UNION
                    SELECT opportunities.id 		
                    FROM opportunities_users 		
                    INNER JOIN opportunities ON opportunities.id = opportunities_users.opportunity_id 			
                                AND opportunities.deleted = 0
                    INNER JOIN users ON users.id = opportunities_users.user_id 			
                                AND users.deleted = 0
                    WHERE opportunities_users.deleted = 0
                    AND opportunities_users.user_role = 'SFAIDN'
                    AND CONCAT(CONCAT(COALESCE(users.first_name,''),' '),COALESCE(users.last_name,'')) LIKE '{0}'

sales_stage_qualified.name: sales_stage_qualified
sales_stage_qualified.comment: Indicates if sales stage of opportunity has ever been set qualified or higher

ac_settings.custom_query:
SELECT id, LTRIM(RTRIM(CONCAT(CONCAT(COALESCE(first_name, ''),' '), COALESCE(last_name,'')))) as name
    FROM users
    WHERE CONCAT(CONCAT(COALESCE(first_name, ''),' '), COALESCE(last_name,'')) LIKE '%$query%'
    AND deleted = 0

SELECT id,
                CONCAT(
                    COALESCE(name,''),
                    CONCAT(
                        (CASE WHEN description IS NOT NULL THEN ' : ' ELSE '' END),
                        COALESCE(description,'')
                    )
                ) as name
            FROM ibm_campaigncode
            WHERE (name LIKE '%$query%' OR description LIKE '%$query%')
                AND (end_date is NULL OR end_date>CURRENT_DATE - 1 YEAR)
                AND deleted = 0
ac_settings.custom_return_name:
CONCAT(
                COALESCE(name,''),
                CONCAT(
                    (CASE WHEN description IS NOT NULL THEN ' : ' ELSE '' END),
                    COALESCE(description,'')
                )
            )
